Very good game i recommend it !

This game has a terrible anti-cheat system with an absolutely poor matchmaking system. After playing this game for 1,000 hours, I still find countless hackers in my competitive games. While the game mechanic of "spray patterns" adds a nice touch to such a simple game, the CS:GO community has crumbled. This game is a good time for when you want to play with friends, but don't ever get into a competitive game. It's no longer worth my time.
Better then league of legends, in every way. Less addicting tho :/
